notes.note: Windows: Firefox is now easier to update with one less prompt (User Account Control)
Page Source now has line numbers
OS X: WebGL performance may be degraded on some hardware
Some TinyMCE-based editors failed to load
OS X: nsCocoaWindow::ConstrainPosition uses wrong screen in multi-display setup
URLs pasted into the download manager window are now automatically downloaded
Line breaks are now supported in the title attribute
Improvements to "Find in Page" to center search result
Support for the text-align-last CSS property has been added

If you try to start Firefox using a locked profile, it will crash (see [573369][1])


  [1]: http://bugzilla.mozilla.org/573369
